resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
last seen a long time ago
un1 changed the group name to un2
un1 joined the group via invite link
You joined the group via invite link
This group was upgraded to a supergroup
You changed the group name to un2
Number of last messages to forward:
Please allow Telegram to receive calls and SMS so that we can fill in your phone number, send you a code, and enter it for you.
Please allow Telegram to receive calls so that we can automatically enter your code for you.
Please allow Telegram to receive calls and SMS so that we can automatically enter your code for you.
Please allow Telegram to receive SMS so that we can automatically enter your code for you.
Some of your older masks sets have been archived. You can reactivate them in the Masks Settings.
You can have up to 200 mask sets installed. Unused masks are archived when you install new sets.
Some of your older sticker sets have been archived. You can reactivate them in the Stickers Settings.
You can have up to 200 sticker sets installed. Unused stickers are archived when you install new sets.

Are you sure you want to delete this video?

"Are you sure you want to log out?
Note that you can seamlessly use Telegram on all your devices at once.
Remember, logging out kills all your Secret Chats."
Are you sure you want to cancel registration?
Are you sure you want to start a secret chat?
Are you sure you want to terminate all other sessions?
Are you sure you want to share your phone number?
The bot will know your phone number. This can be useful for integration with other services.
Are you sure you want to share your phone number %1$s with %2$s?
Are you sure you want to unblock this contact?

Please note that Telegram Support is done by volunteers. We try to respond as quickly as possible, but it may take a while.

Please take a look at the Telegram FAQ: it has answers to most questions and important tips for troubleshooting.
Require passcode if away for a time.
Allow %1$s to pass your Telegram name and id (not your phone number) to pages you open with this bot?
"If emoji on %1$s's screen are the same, this call is 100%% secure."

"This image and text were derived from the encryption key for this call with %1$s.

If they look the same on %2$s's device, end-to-end encryption is guaranteed."

"Somebody with access to your phone number %1$s has requested to delete your Telegram account and reset your 2-Step Verification password. If this wasn't you, please enter the code we've just sent you via SMS to your number."
The deletion process was cancelled for your account %1$s. You may close this window now.
You will now see a lock icon on the chats page. Tap it to lock your Telegram app with your new passcode.

"When you set up an additional passcode, a lock icon will appear on the chats page. Tap it to lock and unlock your Telegram app.
Note: if you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app. All secret chats will be lost."
We will send an SMS with a confirmation code to your new number.
The number %1$s is already connected to a Telegram account. Please delete that account before migrating to the new number.
Sorry, you have reserved too many public usernames. You can revoke the link from one of your older groups or channels, or create a private entity instead.
Are you sure you want to make %1$s an administrator?
un1 added you to this channel
"This user hasn't joined the channel yet. Do you want to invite them?"
You can add administrators to help you manage your channel. Tap and hold to remove admins.
Channels are a new tool for broadcasting your messages to large audiences.
Unfortunately, you were banned from participating in public groups.
Sorry, this chat is no longer accessible.
Sorry, this chat is no longer accessible.
"Sorry, you can't send messages to this channel."
Wait! Deleting this channel will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Delete the channel anyway?
You will lose all messages in this channel.
"Do you want to join the channel '%1$s'?"
Are you sure you want to leave the channel?
Anyone who has Telegram installed will be able to join your channel by following this link.
Only channel administrators can see this list.

Members will not be notified when you post
Members will be notified when you post
Private channels can only be joined via an invite link.
People can join your channel by following this link. You can revoke the link any time.

"Please choose a link for your public channel, so that people can find it in search and share with others.
If you're not interested, we suggest creating a private channel instead."
Public channels can be found in search, anyone can join them.
Add names of the admins to the messages they post.
"Sorry, you can only add the first 200 members to a channel. Note that an unlimited number of people may join via the channel's link."
"Sorry, you can't add this user to channels."
Sorry, too many admins in this channel.
Sorry, too many bots in this channel.
Sorry, this user decided to leave this channel, so you cannot invite them back here.
People can share this link with others and find your channel using Telegram search.

"Please note that if you choose a public link for your channel, anyone will be able to find it in search and join.
Do not create this link if you want your channel to stay private."
Forward messages here to save them
Send media and files to store them
Access this chat from any device
Use search to quickly find things
Open external links within the app
Logs out all devices except for this one.

"%1$s is using an older version of Telegram, so secret photos will be shown in compatibility mode.
Once %2$s updates Telegram, photos with timers for 1 minute or less will start working in 'Tap and hold to view' mode, and you will be notified whenever the other party takes a screenshot."
Are you sure you want to delete this entry from the calls log?
%1$s is not on Telegram yet, would you like to invite them to join?
This action is irreversible. It is not possible to downgrade a supergroup to a regular group.

"Members limit reached. To go over the limit and get additional features, upgrade to a supergroup: • Supergroups can get up to %1$s • New members can see the full message history • Deleted messages will disappear for all members • Admins can pin important messages • Creator can set a public link for the group"
"In supergroups: • New members can see the full message history • Deleted messages will disappear for all members • Admins can pin important messages • Creator can set a public link for the group"
"Sorry, you can't create a group with these users because of their privacy settings."
Tap on the palette icon to view the list of elements on each screen - and edit them.
You can create your own theme by changing colors within the app. You can always switch back to the default Telegram theme here.
These users will or will not be able to call you regardless of the settings above.
"Important: you won't be able to see Last Seen times for people with whom you don't share your Last Seen time. Approximate last seen will be shown instead (recently, within a week, within a month)."
These users will or will not be able to add you to groups and channels regardless of the settings above.
These settings will override the values above.
If you do not come online at least once within this period, your account will be deleted along with all groups, messages and contacts.
Are you sure you want to delete this theme?
You can provide an optional description for your channel.
You can provide an optional description for your group.
Show recent chats in share menu

"Please follow these steps to complete Two-Step Verification Setup:
1. Check your e-mail (don't forget the spam folder) %1$s
2. Click on the validation link."
"You have enabled Two-Step verification. You'll need the password you set up here to log in to your Telegram account."
Leave no trace on our servers
%s invited you to join a secret chat.
You have invited %s to join a secret chat.

"This image and text were derived from the encryption key for this secret chat with %1$s.

If they look the same on %2$s's device, end-to-end encryption is guaranteed.

Learn more at telegram.org"

"Sorry, you can't add this user to groups because of user's privacy settings."

Sorry, this chat does not seem to exist.

Sorry, this name is already taken.
Anyone who has Telegram installed will be able to join your group by following this link.
The name must not exceed 32 characters.
Channel names must have at least 5 characters.
Group names must have at least 5 characters.
"Channel names can't start with a number."
"Group names can't start with a number."

"Clearing the local database will delete the texts of cached messages and compress the database to save internal disk space. Telegram needs some data to work, so database size will not reach zero.
This operation can take a few minutes to complete."
You have enabled Two-Step Verification, so your account is protected with an additional password.

People can join your group by following this link. You can revoke the link any time.
Public groups can be found in search, chat history is available to everyone and anyone can join.
People can share this link with others and find your group using Telegram search.

Do not create this link if you want your supergroup to stay private."

You can log in to Telegram from other mobile, tablet and desktop devices, using the same phone number. All your data will be instantly synchronized.

"%1$s, We detected a login into your account from a new device on %2$s
Device: %3$s Location: %4$s
If this wasn't you, you can go to Settings - Privacy and Security - Sessions and terminate that session.
If you think that somebody logged in to your account against your will, you can enable two-step verification in Privacy and Security settings.
Sincerely, The Telegram Team"
LED is a small blinking light on some devices that is used to indicate new messages.
Keep a low impact background connection to Telegram to receive notifications. Enable for reliable notifications.
Relaunch app when shut down by user or system. This will ensure app can show notifications.

LightGram delivers messages faster than
any other application.

LightGram is free forever. No ads.
No subscription fees.

LightGram keeps your messages safe
from hacker attacks.

LightGram has no limits on the size of
your media and chats.

LightGram lets you access your messages
from multiple devices.

LightGram messages are heavily encrypted
and can self-destruct.
Hint must be different from your password
Please create a hint for your password
You can save your payment info for future use.
Please *turn on Two-Step Verification* to enable this.
Your card %1$s is on file. To pay with this card, please enter your 2-Step-Verification password.
Unable to reach payment server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Sorry, it is not possible to deliver to your address.
Sorry, the payment was cancelled by the bot.
You can save your shipping info for future use.
You have just successfully transferred %1$s to %2$s for %3$s
You have just successfully transferred %1$s to %2$s
Do you really want to transfer %1$s to the %2$s bot for %3$s?
Your recovery e-mail %1$s is not yet active and pending confirmation.
Telegram needs access to your contacts so that you can connect with your friends across all your devices.
Telegram needs access to draw above other apps to play videos in Picture-in-Picture mode.
Telegram needs access to your microphone so that you can send voice messages.
Telegram needs access to your microphone so that you can record videos.
Telegram needs access to your camera so that you can capture photos and videos.
Telegram needs access to your location so that you can share it with your friends.
Telegram needs access to your location.
Telegram needs access to your storage so that you can send and save photos, videos, music and other media.
"All your Telegram contacts will get your new number added to their address book, provided they had your old number and you haven't blocked them in Telegram."
Sorry, you have deleted and re-created your account too many times recently. Please wait for a few days before signing up again.

"You can change your Telegram number here. Your account and all your cloud data — messages, media, contacts, etc. will be moved to the new number. Important: all your Telegram contacts will get your new number added to their address book, provided they had your old number and you haven't blocked them in Telegram."
Do you want to pin this message in this group?
Higher priority notifications will work even if your phone is in Do Not Disturb mode.
Sorry, too many requests. Unable to change privacy settings now, please wait.
New messages from this contact will appear on your screen when you are not using Telegram.

Set up your first and last name
Tap and hold on user to delete.
Are you sure you want to report spam from this user?
Are you sure you want to report spam from this channel?
Are you sure you want to report spam from this group?
Your recent attempts to reset this account have been cancelled by its active user. Please try again in 7 days.
"Since the account %1$s is active and protected by a password, we will delete it in 1 week for security purposes. You can cancel this process at any time."
"You'll be able to reset your account in:"
You will lose all your chats and messages, along with any media and files you shared, if you proceed with resetting your account.

"This action can't be undone.
If you reset your account, all your messages and chats will be deleted."
Reset all notification settings to default
Do you want to reset your usage statistics?

"We have sent a recovery code to the e-mail you provided:
%1$s"
Please check your e-mail and enter the 6-digit code we have sent here.
"If you can't restore access to your e-mail, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account."
"Since you haven't provided a recovery e-mail when setting up your password, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account."
Are you sure you want to revoke this link? Once the link is revoked, no one will be able to join using it.
The previous invite link is now inactive. A new link has been generated.
"Are you sure you want to revoke the link %1$s? The group \"%2$s\" will become private."
"Are you sure you want to revoke the link %1$s? The channel \"%2$s\" will become private."

"If enabled, you can take screenshots of the app, but the system will display your chats in the task switcher even when the passcode is on.
You may need to restart the app for this to take effect."
"Please note that inline bots are provided by third-party developers. For the bot to work, the symbols you type after the bot's username are sent to the respective developer."
Would you like to enable extended link previews in Secret Chats? Note that link previews are generated on Telegram servers.
"We've sent the code to the Telegram app on your other device."
"We've sent an activation call to your phone %1$s. Don't take it, Telegram will process everything automatically."
We are calling your phone %1$s to dictate a code.
"We've sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone %1$s."
Control your sessions on other devices.
You can set a password that will be required when you log in on a new device in addition to the code you get in the SMS.

Only admins can add and remove members, edit name and photo of the group.

You can choose a username on Telegram. If you do, other people will be able to find you by this username and contact you without knowing your phone number.

You can use a–z, 0–9 and underscores. Minimum length is 5 characters.

Sorry, this username is already taken.
The username must not exceed 32 characters.
A username must have at least 5 characters.

Please add your valid e-mail. It is the only way to recover a forgotten password.

"No, seriously.
If you forget your password, you will lose access to your Telegram account. There will be no way to restore it."
Your password for Two-Step Verification is now active.

"Warning! Warning! The developer has no responsibility in this case. So if you do not know what it press back button.
Note that if you delete your account, all your messages, groups and contacts will be deleted beyond retrieval. This is a one-way trip.
Warning! Please only delete your account if you no longer want to use Telegram. If you delete your account now, it may not be possible to sign up again immediately.
- If you want to change your number in Telegram, you can do this in settings menu. - If your account was limited due to spam-related activity, deleting it will not remove the limitations.
Enter your phone number in international format. For example if your number is \"09112223344\" you should enter \"+989112223344\"."

"Telegram will send you a password via Telegram (no SMS).
Enter that password in this section. If you want to delete another account press X button.
If press back button and come back again, deletion starts from this step. "
"Note if you really want to delete the account with following number, enter 4 digit code. If you entered the code, and you've touched the tick button there is no turning back."

"Please note that you and your contact need to enable last seen option."

۱. کانال های دارای محتوای سیاسی و ضد نظام جمهوری اسلامی ایران
۳. کانال های که هرگونه قوانین حق انتشار محتوا را رعایت نمی کنند

برنامه ی ممبر بگیر تله گرام برنامه ای است که می توانید کانال تلگرام خود را معرفی کنید و برای کانال خود عضو دریافت کنید...نظرات سازنده ی شما می تواند در هرچه بهتر شدن برنامه ما را یاری کند
